sub_title: Seasoned Events & Strategic Meetings Management Program Manager
summary:
Passionate and dedicated Marcom Events professional with international experience working for global pharmaceutical corporations planning a wide variety of events of all scales. Strong expertise in Corporate & Brand Communications, Marketing Communication Strategy & Execution and Events Management & Strategic Planning. 
Highly organised, flexible and experience working in a fast paced environment. Resourceful problem solver with strong communication skills. Committed to meeting and exceeding goals and used to performing within a multicultural environment. Able to multi-task and manage a large staff effectively. A strong history of client satisfaction and succesful event management.



Specialties: Strategic event management,  project management, sponsorship, corporate identity, branding, design, marketing communications, content marketing,  booth design, customer experience, congress management,  contract negotiation, people management, exhibitions, meeting management, budget management, vendor management, stand-alone events, creative designs, brand activation, budgetting, B2B events, team player, relation management, self-starter, live communication, strategic thinking and effective execution, freelance, logistical skills, multitasking
